lore: These creatures dig intricate tunnels and set multiple traps on the surface to prey on mice, though occasionally they manage to feed on wild rabbits and baby pigs. They do not like the heat and stay underground in humid areas all the time. Nowadays, their horns are known to have analgesic properties. Fortunately, the authorities obtained this information before it was common knowledge, so measures could be taken before indiscriminate hunting threatened this species.
menagerieDialog: I do not wish to speak to you right now. I would prefer to return to where I came from.
You would dare to rip me from my portal and summon me to this dying world? You have no shame.
I am bound to serve you, but know that it is not by choice.
I do not belong here in your filthy Menagerie. I deserve my own quarters in your castle!
Give me freedom, or give me death!
name: Hermitey
